backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend canister placeholder with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features with their associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for the crypto trading app.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short descriptions summarizing each file's purpose and key exports.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Crypto Position Monitor PWA, including manifest link, theme color, Apple touch icon, and mobile web app meta tags.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest for Crypto Position Monitor defining app name, icons, display mode, theme color, and an 'Add Position' shortcut.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first for static assets, network-first for HTML and Binance API calls, and cache cleanup on activation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing tab navigation, settings dialog open state via useState, position storage/monitoring hooks, and rendering the header, banners, and tab content areas.
frontend/src/components/AdjustmentSugges: Alert-style card that presents an AI-generated stop-loss or take-profit adjustment suggestion with accept and dismiss actions.
frontend/src/components/AIDailyTradesSec: Collapsible section component that displays AI-generated daily trades using React Query hooks for trade generation, monitoring, and storage, with loading skeletons and a force-refresh button.
frontend/src/components/AIDailyTradesSum: Summary panel showing aggregated AI portfolio PnL, win/loss counts, and reversal guard activations for the current day based on active trades and trade history.
frontend/src/components/AIDailyTradesTab: Tab layout component that composes AIDailyTradesSection and PerformanceComparisonPanel into a single view.
frontend/src/components/AIInsightsTab.ts: Tab component that renders per-position AI insights including sentiment gauges, trend predictions, and dismissible adjustment suggestions for a list of positions.
frontend/src/components/AITradeCard.tsx: Card component that displays detailed information for a single AI trade, including modality badge, risk management step progress, TP/SL levels, PnL, and status badges including reversal guard.
frontend/src/components/BinanceCredentia: Form panel for saving, clearing, and testing Binance API credentials, with connection status feedback and a timeout-aware authenticated test request to the Binance Futures API.
frontend/src/components/CredentialStatus: A memoized React component that displays badge indicators for API key presence and live trading mode, reactively updating via custom DOM events ('credential-change', 'live-trading-change') without page reload.
frontend/src/components/DashboardTab.tsx: The main dashboard tab component that renders capital summary, open positions, and a position entry form, with a Binance import button that appears when API credentials are available.
frontend/src/components/ExposureChart.ts: Renders two cards showing asset allocation percentages and long/short balance as progress bars, based on exposure and capital data passed as props.
frontend/src/components/InstallButton.ts: A PWA install button that triggers the native install prompt if available, or shows a manual instructions modal for browsers that don't support it; hidden when the app is already installed.
frontend/src/components/InstallInstructi: A dialog modal that provides step-by-step PWA installation instructions for multiple browsers (Chrome, Safari, Edge, Firefox), each with icons and numbered steps.
frontend/src/components/LiveTradingBanne: A memoized amber warning banner that appears at the top of the page when live trading is active, listening to custom DOM events to update reactively.
frontend/src/components/LiveTradingToggl: A toggle switch component for enabling/disabling live trading mode, featuring a confirmation dialog before activation, a loading state with a 20-second outer timeout safety guard, and toast error notifications.
frontend/src/components/PerformanceCompa: Renders a side-by-side performance comparison panel between AI trades and user trades, displaying metrics like win rate, PnL, and trade counts sourced from local storage utilities.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioExposur: Displays a portfolio exposure dashboard card showing deployed capital percentage and capital-at-risk metrics, reactively updating when total capital changes via a custom DOM event.
frontend/src/components/PositionCard.tsx: Renders an individual trading position card with PnL display, TP/SL proximity indicators, AI insights collapsible section, adjustment suggestions, and a trade outcome modal triggered on deletion.
frontend/src/components/PositionDashboar: Manages and displays the list of active trading positions using real-time price monitoring, showing an empty state prompt or a grid of PositionCard components with add/delete/update controls.
frontend/src/components/PositionEntryFor: Provides a form for creating a new trading position by collecting symbol, type, leverage, entry price, and investment amount, then fetching historical klines to auto-calculate take-profit and stop-loss levels.
frontend/src/components/PositionSizeCalc: A React component that calculates optimal position sizes based on capital, risk percentage, entry price, stop loss price, and leverage, with results displayed in real-time and an optional apply callback.
frontend/src/components/RiskManagementTa: A tab layout component that composes the PositionSizeCalculator, PortfolioExposureDashboard, and ScenarioSimulator into a single risk management view, showing a placeholder when no positions exist.
frontend/src/components/ScenarioSimulato: A component that simulates portfolio P&L impact for custom or preset market price change scenarios using a slider and preset buttons, with liquidation risk and high-loss warnings.
frontend/src/components/SentimentGauge.t: Displays market sentiment (bullish/bearish/neutral) for a given symbol using a score badge, strength progress bar, and a list of contributing indicator factors fetched via a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: A modal dialog with three tabs for configuring Binance API credentials, enabling live trading mode, and setting total capital for risk calculations.
frontend/src/components/StopLossRecommen: Renders stop loss details for a position including price, distance percentage, max loss, capital risk, reasoning, and a partial-taking strategy, with a visual warning when price is near the stop loss.
frontend/src/components/TabNavigation.ts: A sticky top navigation bar that renders four app tabs (Dashboard, AI Daily Trades, AI Insights, Risk Management) with active state highlighting and responsive label truncation.
frontend/src/components/TakeProfitRecomm: Renders a list of take-profit level cards showing target price, distance from current price, expected profit, and whether each level has been reached, for a given position type.
frontend/src/components/TotalCapitalInpu: A form card that lets the user enter and save their total trading capital to local storage, with validation and a success toast notification.
frontend/src/components/TotalCapitalSumm: Displays a capital summary card showing total, deployed, available, and at-risk capital across all positions, with inline editing support and reactivity to capital changes via a custom DOM event.
frontend/src/components/TradeOutcomeModa: A dialog modal for closing a position by selecting a trade outcome (TP hit, SL hit, or manual close), entering an exit price, and saving a computed PnL record to trade history.
frontend/src/components/TrendPredictionC: Displays AI-generated short-term and medium-term trend predictions (direction and confidence) for a given symbol using the useTrendPrediction hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor via React Query, using the current Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdjustmentSuggesti: React Query hook that fetches hourly Binance kline data for each position and generates trade adjustment suggestions, refreshing every 30 seconds.
A React Query hook that generates AI trades for each trading modality, persists them via storage, and optionally places live Binance market, take-profit, and stop-loss orders with per-call timeouts and toast feedback.
React Query hook that polls current prices for AI trades, updates TP/SL execution state, detects market reversals, and persists trade state to localStorage with daily scoping.
frontend/src/hooks/useAITradeStorage.ts: Hook providing CRUD helpers (getTrades, saveTrades, clearTrades, checkAndResetDaily) for persisting AI trades in localStorage, with backward-compatible default field values.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinancePairs.ts: Thin React Query hook that fetches and caches Binance perpetual futures pairs for one hour with up to 3 retries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login/logout state and persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveTradingMode.ts: Hook that manages live trading toggle state, validates Binance Futures API credentials with a timeout before enabling, and syncs state via custom window events.
Memoized hook that computes portfolio exposure metrics from a list of positions with prices using calculatePortfolioExposure.
frontend/src/hooks/usePositionMonitoring: React Query hook that fetches live prices for all positions every 5 seconds and computes PnL and distance-to-TP/SL for each.
frontend/src/hooks/usePositionStorage.ts: Custom hook that persists trading positions to localStorage and optionally places live market, take-profit, and stop-loss orders on Binance Futures with per-call timeouts and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Hook that captures the browser's beforeinstallprompt event to expose PWA installability state and an install() trigger function.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file that exports nothing; notes that all backend operations are handled via direct Binance API calls and the backend canister is unused.
React Query hook that fetches 100 hourly klines from Binance Futures and returns a sentiment analysis result, refreshing every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrendPrediction.ts: React Query hook that fetches hourly and daily klines from Binance Futures and returns short-term and medium-term trend predictions, refreshing every 5 minutes.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind directives, defines light and dark golden-themed CSS custom properties (OKLCH), and adds utility classes for animations, glow effects, and PWA standalone mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/services/binanceApi.ts: Service module providing functions to fetch Binance USD-M Futures perpetual pairs, current prices, and OHLCV klines, plus a helper to extract close prices from kline data.
frontend/src/services/binanceOrderServic: Service that places MARKET, TAKE_PROFIT_MARKET, and STOP_MARKET orders on Binance USD-M Futures using HMAC-SHA256 signing via the Web Crypto API with a 15-second request timeout.
frontend/src/services/binancePositionSer: Service that fetches open positions from Binance USD-M Futures (/fapi/v2/positionRisk), signs requests with HMAC-SHA256, and maps non-zero positions to the app's internal Position type with placeholder TP/SL levels.
frontend/src/types/adjustment.ts: TypeScript type definitions for trade adjustment suggestions (take-profit or stop-loss) and their acceptance/dismissal history.
frontend/src/types/aiTrade.ts: Defines TypeScript types for AI-managed trades, including trade status, trading modality, risk management steps, TP/SL execution state, reversal detection state, and a price-enriched variant for UI consumption.
frontend/src/types/binanceApi.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and types for Binance Futures API responses, including account info, positions, orders, assets, and order ID tracking.
frontend/src/types/calculator.ts: Defines input and result interfaces for a position size calculator, covering capital, risk, entry/stop prices, leverage, and computed risk/reward metrics.
frontend/src/types/exposure.ts: Defines interfaces for portfolio exposure analysis, including per-asset exposure, long/short balance, correlation risk, and warning flags.
frontend/src/types/position.ts: Defines interfaces for trading positions, including take-profit levels, stop-loss recommendations, and a price-enriched variant with PnL and distance metrics.
frontend/src/types/prediction.ts: Defines types for trend predictions, including direction, confidence, time horizon, and historical prediction records with optional actual outcomes.
frontend/src/types/reversal.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for market reversal detection signals and supporting indicators such as RSI divergence, EMA crossover, candlestick patterns, volatility spikes, and support/resistance violations.
frontend/src/types/scenario.ts: Defines interfaces for scenario analysis, including percentage-change inputs, per-position outcome projections, aggregate scenario results, and preset scenarios.
frontend/src/types/sentiment.ts: Defines types for market sentiment analysis, including sentiment score, individual contributing factors, and an aggregate analysis with strength and timestamp.
frontend/src/types/tradeHistory.ts: Defines interfaces for user and AI trade history records, modality-level statistics, and overall performance metrics including win rate and PnL.
frontend/src/utils/adjustmentSuggestions: Generates stop-loss and take-profit adjustment suggestions for open positions based on ATR-derived volatility, 24h price change, and proximity to support/resistance levels.
frontend/src/utils/aiTradeHistoryStorage: Provides localStorage-backed CRUD utilities for persisting AI trade history records, with duplicate-entry prevention on save.
frontend/src/utils/aiTradeSelection.ts: Computes technical indicators (EMA, RSI, ATR, momentum) from Binance kline data and uses modality-specific configs to generate AI trade signals with TP/SL levels.
frontend/src/utils/binanceAuth.ts: Provides HMAC-SHA256 signed authenticated fetch for the Binance API with a 15-second timeout, combined abort signal support, and a typed BinanceApiError for timeout and failure cases.
Calculates portfolio-level exposure metrics including total capital deployed, weighted average leverage, long/short balance, per-asset exposure breakdown, correlated position risks, and warning flags from a list of positions with prices.
frontend/src/utils/liveTradingStorage.ts: Manages live trading mode toggle and Binance API credentials in localStorage, dispatching deferred custom DOM events on changes and providing legacy aliases for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/utils/marketReversalDetecto: Detects market trend reversals by analyzing Binance kline data using RSI divergence, EMA crossovers, candlestick patterns, ATR volatility spikes, and support/resistance violations, with timeframes configured per trading modality.
frontend/src/utils/performanceCalculatio: Computes win rate, total PnL, and performance metrics for user and AI trade records, with the AI variant also producing a per-modality breakdown sorted in a defined order.
frontend/src/utils/pnlCalculations.ts: Provides two pure functions: one to calculate leveraged PnL in USD and percent for long or short positions, and one to calculate the percentage distance between a current price and a target price.
frontend/src/utils/positionSizeCalculato: Calculates position size, contract count, risk amount, reward amount, and risk-reward ratio from capital, risk percentage, stop-loss price, entry price, and leverage inputs.
frontend/src/utils/registerServiceWorker: Registers a service worker at '/service-worker.js', listens for updates and prompts the user to reload, and schedules hourly update checks.
frontend/src/utils/scenarioSimulator.ts: Simulates the impact of a percentage price change across all open positions, determining projected PnL, TP/SL hits, and liquidation risk for each position, and aggregating total portfolio impact.
frontend/src/utils/sentimentAnalysis.ts: Derives market sentiment (bullish/bearish/neutral) from close prices and volumes by computing RSI, MACD, price action trend, volume trend, and momentum, then aggregating the signals into a weighted sentiment score with contributing factors.
frontend/src/utils/stopLossCalculator.ts: Calculates a stop-loss price and associated risk metrics for a leveraged position using ATR, support/resistance levels, and a base risk percentage that tightens with higher leverage.
Generates three take-profit levels for a leveraged position by combining volatility, support/resistance clusters, and leverage-adjusted multipliers, returning price, profit USD, and reasoning for each level.
frontend/src/utils/technicalAnalysis.ts: Provides core technical analysis helpers: ATR calculation, volatility (std dev of returns), support/resistance detection via price clustering, and risk/reward ratio computation.
frontend/src/utils/totalCapitalStorage.t: Manages total trading capital in localStorage and dispatches a custom DOM event ('total-capital-change') on every write so dependent components can reactively update.
frontend/src/utils/tradeHistoryStorage.t: Provides CRUD helpers for persisting user trade records in localStorage, including get, save (append), and clear operations.
frontend/src/utils/trendPrediction.ts: Predicts short-term (1–24 h) and medium-term (1–7 day) price trend direction and confidence using moving averages, momentum, and volatility derived from hourly and daily price arrays.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based design tokens (colors, border radius, shadows, animations), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 45) documenting the app's architecture, existing features, and known bugs including unresponsive settings UI, Live Trade Mode freeze, and missing Import from Binance button.
